Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel with multiple rooms.

    • initializeHotel

      private void initializeHotel(String name, int numrooms, int type, double price)
      Initializes a hotel
      Parameters:
      name - name of hotel
      numrooms - number of rooms of hotel
      type - type of hotel(standard or divided)
      price - base price of rooms for the hotel

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the hotel.
      Returns:
      the name of the hotel

    • isUniqueRoom

      public boolean isUniqueRoom(int ID)
      Checks if a room ID is unique within the hotel.
      Parameters:
      ID - the room ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the room ID is unique, false otherwise

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(int ID, int model)
      Adds a new room to the hotel with a specified ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the new room
      model - the type of the room

    • getRooms

      public ArrayList<Room> getRooms()
      gets the rooms array for the hotel
      Returns:
      the rooms array of the hotel

    • sumTotal

      public double sumTotal()
      Calculates the total revenue of the hotel.
      Returns:
      the total revenue

    • updatePrice

      public String updatePrice(double price)
      Updates the price of all rooms in the hotel into a new price
      Parameters:
      price - the new price of the rooms
      Returns:
      a string that is displayed in the controller's managebuttonlistener if it doesnt satisfy the requirements

    • searchRoom

      public int searchRoom(int key)
      Method for searching up a specific room in the hotel using its ID.
      Parameters:
      key - the the room ID to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the room if found, -1 if not found

    • searchGuest

      public int searchGuest(Room room, String key)
      Method for searching up a specific guest in the hotel using their name and room index.
      Parameters:
      room - the room to search index
      key - for searching index of guest name in a room
      Returns:
      the index of the guest if found, -1 if not found

    • removeReservation

      public String removeReservation(Room room, String guestName)
      Removes a reservation from this hotel
      Parameters:
      room - the room to remove the reservation from
      guestName - the guest who's reservation is to be removed
      Returns:
      message that tells user the outcome of the process

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Method for setting a new name for the hotel.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel

    • setDatePrice

      public void setDatePrice(int date, double percentage)
      Method for setting a DatePrice for the hotel
      Parameters:
      date - the date to set a dateprice
      percentage - the percentage the dateprice is set to

    • getDatePrice

      public ArrayList<Double> getDatePrice()
      Method for getting the dateprice array of the hotel
      Returns:
      the array of doubles containing the dateprices of the hotel

    • addPrice

      public void addPrice(double price, int index)
      adds price to a room at a certain index
      Parameters:
      price - the price to be added
      index - the index of the room the price is added to

    • findRoomIndexByGuest

      public int findRoomIndexByGuest(String guestName)
      finds the room index reserved by searching using guest name
      Parameters:
      guestName - the guest to be searched
      Returns:
      the index of the room, if not found, return -1
